data.name: Don't wake dad up !!! (counting Decibals)
data.description:
John likes to go down stairs to do what he wants every night.

There is one problem though, John doesn't want to wake his dad up, Luckily John knows exactly how loud what he is going to do is, (this will be arr, an array of numbers that represents the volume of what John is going to do), and how loud his dad is (m).

Your task is given arr and m, find out if his John can do what he wants without waking his dad up. If he can (he is quiet enough) return true, other wise return false.

the numbers will represent the volume in decibals.
Remeber that for every ten decibals it gets ten times louder.
so 60DB = 50DB * 10, which means ([50,50,50,50,50,50,50,50,50],60) would return true
and ([50,50,50,50,50,50,50,50,50,50],60) would return false
